data.eml:eml: Additions to the Indonesian crab fauna of the genus Mariaplax Rahayu & Ng, 2014, and notes on Hexapus timika Rahayu & Ng, 2014 (Crustacea, Decapoda, Brachyura, Hexapodidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rahayu, Dwi Listyo, Widyastuti, Ernawati (2018): Additions to the Indonesian crab fauna of the genus Mariaplax Rahayu & Ng, 2014, and notes on Hexapus timika Rahayu & Ng, 2014 (Crustacea, Decapoda, Brachyura, Hexapodidae). Zootaxa 4379 (2): 231-246, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4379.2.5
